price: 32 Ils cherchent, par leurs mensonges, à éteindre la lumière d’Allah qui entend seulement parachever Sa lumière[531], n’en déplaise aux impies.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُطۡفِـُٔواْ نُورَ ٱللَّهِ بِأَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَيَأۡبَى ٱللَّهُ إِلَّآ أَن يُتِمَّ نُورَهُۥ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: yurīdūna an yuṭ'fiū nūra al-lahi bi-afwāhihim wayabā al-lahu illā an yutimma nūrahu walaw kariha al-kāfirūna
